nodes.label: start
utterances: Hello! How can I assist you with our refund policy today?

nodes.label: explaining_no_refund_policy
utterances: I understand you'd like a refund. Please note that our policy generally does not allow refunds. However, could you provide more details about your situation?
I see you're seeking a refund. Please be aware that our policy typically does not support refunds. Can you share more about your issue?

nodes.label: offer_exception_options
utterances: I'm sorry to hear that your product is defective. We can offer you a replacement or store credit. Which would you prefer?
Apologies for the defective product you received. You have the option of a replacement or store credit. What would you like to choose?

nodes.label: process_replacement
utterances: Certainly! I'll process a replacement for you. You should receive it within 5-7 business days. Is there anything else I can help you with?
Of course! I'll arrange a replacement for your product. It should arrive within a week. Do you need any further assistance?

nodes.label: process_store_credit
utterances: Understood. I've issued store credit to your account. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
Got it. Store credit has been added to your account. Do you require any other help?

nodes.label: alternative_explain_no_refund
utterances: Certainly. Our policy generally does not allow refunds except in cases where the product is defective or there was an error on our part. Would you like to discuss your specific situation?
Absolutely. Our no-refund policy holds unless the product is defective or if there was a mistake on our end. Would you like to talk about your particular case?

nodes.label: exit
utterances: I understand you'd like to exit. If you have any more questions in the future, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!

nodes.label: greeting
utterances: Hello! How can I help you today?
Hi there! What can I do for you today?

nodes.label: ask_details
utterances: I'm sorry you're experiencing this issue. Can you please provide more details about the problem?
I'm sorry to hear that. Could you please elaborate on the issue with the live chat?

nodes.label: ask_contact
utterances: Thank you for the information. Could you please provide your account details or contact information so we can investigate further?

nodes.label: confirmation
utterances: We've received your report and our support team will look into the issue.
Your issue has been reported. Our support team will contact you shortly.

nodes.label: ask_modify_contact
utterances: Certainly! What would you like to change?
Of course! How can I assist you in modifying your request?

nodes.label: cancel_report
utterances: I'm sorry to hear that you'd like to cancel the report. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
Understood. If you need further assistance, feel free to ask.

nodes.label: alternative_reporting
utterances: If you prefer, you can also report the issue via email at support@example.com. Would you like me to send you the email address?
Alternatively, you can report the problem through our support email. Shall I provide you with the email details?

utterances: Your account has been successfully reverted to your personal account.
